text:
="preserve">Anil Devgan (1969 – 5 October 2020) was an Indian movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Mumbai, Maharashtra. He was known for directing "Raju Chacha", "Blackmail" and "Haal-e-Dil". He also wrote the screenplays for movies.
Devgan died of cardiac arrest on 5 October 2020 in Mumbai at the age of 51.
